sentences.en: A shallow water acoustic field algorithm using finite automaton was presented.
sentences.cn: 提出一种用有穷状态自动机研究浅海声场的方法.

sentences.en: Automaton theory is a basic theory of compile routine for identifying words.
sentences.cn: 自动机理论是编译程序中单词识别的基本理论.

sentences.en: Do you think I an an automaton?
sentences.cn: 依以为我是一架自动机器 吗 ?

sentences.en: I get sick of being thought of as a political automaton.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌被看作政治机器。

sentences.en: In existing one - dimensional cellular automaton models of traffic flow, drivers'varying behaviors are the deceleration probability.
sentences.cn: 在已有的交通流一 维 元胞自动机模型中, 司机不同的驾驶行为是以车辆减速概率的形式体现的.

sentences.en: In this paper we discuss one cryptosystem which based on the theory of the finite automaton.
sentences.cn: 该文讨论的是基于有限自动机理论的公钥加密体制.

sentences.en: Man like every other animal is by nature indolent. if nothing spurs him on then he will hardly think and will bahave from habit like an automaton.
sentences.cn: 人如其他动物一样本性慵懒，如果没有什么鞭策著他，他几乎不思考，只是象机器人一样按照习惯去做。

sentences.en: Modularization state automaton implements batch job execution.
sentences.cn: 模块化的状态自动机实现了作业的执行.

sentences.en: One - dimension slow - to - start multi - cellular automaton model of the bus running in the on - line stop is presented.
sentences.cn: 构建了适用于在线公交车站车辆运行的一 维 慢启动 多元 胞自动机仿真模型.

sentences.en: Only an automaton wouldn't have noticed.
sentences.cn: 只有机器人不会注意到这一点.

sentences.en: So the storage structure of finite automaton should the choosed adjacency lists.
sentences.cn: 所以,有穷自动机的存储结构最好采用邻接链表来存储.

sentences.en: The concept of composition of finite automata is first proposed in finite automaton public key cryptosystem.
sentences.cn: 在有限自动机公开钥密码体制中首次提出了自动机化合的概念.

sentences.en: The paper introduces the working principle of the whole system of gold foil manipulating automaton and PLC control system.
sentences.cn: 介绍了金箔装叠精细操作机器人自动化系统总体工作原理及PLC控制系统原理。

words.tran_cn: 自动的；无意识的；必然的
自动地；机械地；无意识地
自动作用；[医] 自动症；自动性
自动化（automate的过去分词）；自动操作

trans.tran_en: a machine, especially one in the shape of a human, that moves without anyone controlling it
